73 #include <string>

78 #define WAITING_DELAY 0.1
79 
80 
81 
83 #define MAX_WAITING_TIME 30
84 
85 
86 
88 bool start = false;
89 
90 
91 
93 actionlib::SimpleActionClient<rt2_assignment1::GoToPointAction>* acglobal;

95 
96 
97 /********************************************/
108 bool user_interface(rt2_assignment1::Command::Request &req, rt2_assignment1::Command::Response &res)
109 {
110  if (req.command == "start")
111  {
112  start = true;
113  std::cout << "[state_machine] START command received. " << std::endl;
114  }
115  else
116  {
117  if ( start )
118  {
119  std::cout << "[state_machine] STOP command received, preempting the goal. " << std::endl;
120 
121  // cancel the running goal
122  acglobal->cancelAllGoals( );
123  }
124  else
125  std::cout << "[state_machine] state machine already stopped. " << std::endl;
126 
127  start = false;
128  }
129  return true;
130 }
131 
132 
133 
134 /********************************************/
139 int main(int argc, char **argv)
140 {
141 
142  ros::init(argc, argv, "state_machine");
143  ros::NodeHandle n;
144 
145  // provided services
146  ros::ServiceServer service= n.advertiseService("/user_interface", user_interface);
147 
148  // client
149  ros::ServiceClient client_rp = n.serviceClient<rt2_assignment1::RandomPosition>("/position_server");
150 
151  // action
152  actionlib::SimpleActionClient<rt2_assignment1::GoToPointAction> ac( "go_to_point", true );
153  acglobal = &ac; // share the access to the action
154  ac.waitForServer( );
155 
156  // bounds for the random target
157  rt2_assignment1::RandomPosition rp;
158  rp.request.x_max = 5.0;
159  rp.request.x_min = -5.0;
160  rp.request.y_max = 5.0;
161  rp.request.y_min = -5.0;
162  rt2_assignment1::Position p;
163 
164  while( ros::ok() )
165  {
166  ros::spinOnce();
167 
168  // execute this only if the node is enabled
169  if (start)
170  {
171  // ask for a random target
172  client_rp.call(rp);
173 
174  // prepare the request to the movement action
175  rt2_assignment1::GoToPointGoal goal;
176  goal.x = rp.response.x;
177  goal.y = rp.response.y;
178  goal.theta = rp.response.theta;
179  std::cout << "NEXT TARGET (" << goal.x << ", " << goal.y << ", " << goal.theta << ")" << std::endl;
180 
181  // the target is requested to the movemet action: the robot starts to move
182  ac.sendGoal( goal );
183 
184  // waiting for the robot to reach the goal unless any preemption request
185  bool success = false;
186  float timeFromStart = 0.f;
187  std::string state = "ACTIVE";
188  while( state != "SUCCEEDED" )
189  {
190  // wait the minimum time
191  (ros::Duration(WAITING_DELAY)).sleep();
192 
193  // update the status of the node
194  ros::spinOnce();
195  timeFromStart += WAITING_DELAY;
196  state = ac.getState( ).toString( );
197 
198  // evaluate the new state
199  if( state == "PREEMPTED" )
200  {
201  std::cout << "The goal has been cancelled. " << std::endl;
202  break;
203  }
204  else if( timeFromStart > MAX_WAITING_TIME )
205  {
206  std::cout << "Unable to reach the final position within the deadline. " << std::endl;
207  break;
208  }
209  }
210  success = ( state == "SUCCEEDED" );
211 
212  if( success )
213  std::cout << "Position reached" << std::endl;
214  else
215  std::cout << "Final goal not reached" << std::endl;
216  }
217  }
218  return 0;
219 }
